protocol.text: Processed data attached here is with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings. Target intensity was set abitrarily to 250. ID_REF =  VALUE = MAS5.0 signal intensity ABS_CALL =
no treatment, experiment is WT vs mutant under standard laboratory conditions
Plants were grown at 22 deg C with 16 hour days on pH 5.7 1x MS agar plates
Roots were cut at the hypocotyl junction and placed into RLT buffer, then into liquid nitrogen. RNA was extracted using the RNAeasy micro kit from Qiagen.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix one-cycle amplification protocol from 1 ug total RNA.
After fragmentation, samples were sent to Expression Analysis in Durham, NC for hybridization according to their protocols.
Chips were scanned at Expression Analysis in Durham, NC according to their protocols
